overview:
nextcloud-calendar: 7 tools; nextcloud_create_event -> Create a new event in a Nextcloud calendar.

    ⚠️ TEMPORAL CHECK: Verify year in start_datetime matches current year
    from system date., nextcloud_delete_event -> 
    Delete an event from Nextcloud Calendar.

    ⚠️ This action cannot be undone.

    Args..., nextcloud_get_event -> 
    Get full details of a specific event by UID.

    Args:
        params: GetEventInput contai..., nextcloud_list_calendars -> 
    List all calendars in your Nextcloud account.

    Returns all calendars you have access to,..., nextcloud_list_events -> 
    List events from Nextcloud Calendar within a date range.

    Defaults to showing events for..., nextcloud_search_events -> 
    Search for events by text in summary, description, or location.

    Searches across a date ..., nextcloud_update_event -> 
    Update an existing event in Nextcloud.

    Only provided fields will be updated.

    Args:...
